We have ZERO evidence that our world can exist at 3°C of global warming. It is, in short, a certain path to disaster. And remember, there is no evidence supporting that warming would stop at 3°C once it is reached. In short, 3°C is likely a path to a Hothouse Earth trajectory. - Johan Rockström
